oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RETINAL - AMINO-ACID SCHIFF-BASES IN REVERSE MICELLAR MATRIX
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RANI, AV
SINGH, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: purple membrane
model compounds
bacteriorhodopsin
water
rhodopsin
pigments
pka
schiff bases
bacteriorhodopsin
rhodopsin
reverse micelle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Schiff bases of retinal with natural amino acids can conveniently be prepared in sodium bis(2-ethylhexyl) sulphosuccinate reversed micelle-solubilized water pool (w = 8) in n-heptane. The micelle -constituted Schiff bases remain stable in protonated form in an environment that compares well with the reaction center of rhodopsins as far as polar and nonpolar domains of the active site is concerned.
